channel.title: Comments on: An innovative kitchen scale … how cool!

item.title: By: Amelie Rencontres
item.dc:creator: Amelie Rencontres
item.description: Like a good wife I love to cook, because I make my husband happy and that is all I need :)) sometimes I have troubles with the quantity and this innovative scale will help me:)) it looks great :)
item.content:encoded: Like a good wife I love to cook, because I make my husband happy and that is all I need :)) sometimes I have troubles with the quantity and this innovative scale will help me:)) it looks great :)
